title: BBC Local Live: Nottinghamshire on Friday 6 January 2017 - BBC News
summary: care home has no criminal case to answer .
more plans for hs2 hub revealed .
robin hood visitor attraction for sale on ebay .
seven services to be moved out of hospitals into community .
nottingham speed skater skips european championships .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live updates have now ended and will return on monday from 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : drier night ahead
text: widespread showery rain will continue to clear over the course of this evening and tonight .
it 'll be cloudy with drier spells between the showers .
lows of 4c ( 39f ) .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC East Midlands Today Weather

documents.title: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
text: here 's what 's happening across our region :
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: care home thanks community for support during 'difficult time '
text: here is what springwater lodge have had to say following the conclusion of the police investigation :
following the coroner 's ruling that the residents died of natural causes , and the police finding that there was no wrongdoing , the investigation has been closed .
our deepest condolences remain with the bereaved families .
we want to thank everyone in the community for their support for the home during this difficult time .
delivering the kindest possible care is at the heart of everything we do and we are grateful for the thoughtful words of our residents and their relatives .
their health , safety and wellbeing will always be our number one priority . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: care home has no criminal case to answer , police say
text: an investigation into deaths at a care home in calverton has concluded there is no criminal case to answer , nottinghamshire police have said .
police were contacted after they received information raising concerns about the deaths of some of the residents in august .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: montanier has no say on lansbury future
text: montanier has no say on lansbury future

documents.title: swede heads to nottingham to collect solar panels
text: that said , i 'm sure my postie on his bike would be thrilled if i turned up with a couple of solar panels to send
not .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: swede 's epic ebay collection in nottingham
text: mr hongvan had to climb up onto a roof in nottingham to take down the solar panels and strap them to the roof of his volvo .
you 'd have thought the seller could have at least pulled them off the roof ?
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: swedish ebay customer completes epic journey
text: talk about dedication .
a dedicated ebay buyer travelled more than 1,000 miles from sweden to nottingham to collect some solar panels .
andreas hongvan , who lives `` off grid '' said the purchases were worth it as he could not find anything like it at home .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: stags tie up deal for baggies defender
text: mansfield town have extended the loan of west brom defender kyle howkins until 31 may 2017 .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Radio Nottingham sports reporter

documents.title: lansbury 'not involved ' against wigan
text: nottingham forest tweets
i 'll leave you to draw your own conclusions
# nffc head coach philippe montanier has arrived to speak to the press ahead of the @ twitterid clash against @ twitterid
pm : we received an offer for henri and we will see .
we are not sure if he will stay , it is not my decision # nffc
pm : it is a possibility that he will leave but also that he will stay , i can not predict the future .
it is less likely he will stay # nffc
pm : henri wo n't be involved tomorrow against wigan as his head is not right to play # nffc
pm : cash is a young player who wants to stay with us .
we have not had a bid for him , it is only speculation # nffc
pm : stojkovic missed the last game to go home and spend time with his family .
he will be in the squad for this weekend # nffc
pm : every year in france we watched the fa cup final .
it is important for us to win the game and a good chance to recover # nffc
pm : there are no players coming back from injury but david vaughan has injured his ribs and will be out # nffc
pm : it is better for the takeover to be done quickly , but it is not simple .
then we will know the budget and the plan for january # nffc
pm : the cup is famous everywhere and for us it is a good opportunity to break our bad run and we will play at 100 per cent # nffc
pm : we need to be more clinical , lucky and better technically .
the players give everything but we need to be more clinical # nffc
pm : the cup can give us a chance to improve our dynamic and stop our bad run .
this game is important for that # nffc
pm : we are looking at signing midfielders , perhaps attackers , but our targets are a secret # nffc
pm : dani pinillos is better but he is not ready to compete with the first team .
he will need a game with the under 23s first # nffc
pm : henri 's situation is different but for the speculation around other players , they have contracts and we want to keep them # nffc
pm : brereton has a good future but he 's 17 and we need to be careful not to burn him out .
it is important to improve him progressively # nffc
that concludes philippe montanier 's pre- @ laticsofficial press conference .
head to for full coverage # nffc
and so that he 's not cup tied for villa
villa wo n't be beating spurs so that is n't really an issue .
you beat me to that , and i 'm a villa fan !
no chance of us beating spurs .
how you feeling about lansbury ?
very undecided if i 'm honest .
do n't know a huge amount , heard mixed things .
he played very well vs us tho
a bit like marmite .
not consistent enough for me but was great prior to 'injury '
'injury ' ?
what 's that about then ?
sus amongst some whether it was genuine .
injured in warm up before derby game .
has n't played since .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: smith : there 's no reason why we ca n't beat morecambe
text: smith has also spoken about how he hopes to inspire the magpies to end their nine-game losing streak against morecambe .
the former leeds and manchester united forward added : `` i 'm not going to play , i 'm going to watch and try to help the lads as much as possible .
`` the main thing is to build confidence and install some belief we can get a result , as there 's no reason why we ca n't . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: smith believes his spell in charge will be one game
text: notts county caretaker boss alan smith has said he only expects to be in charge for one game .
the 36-year-old , who took over after john sheridan was sacked , said : `` i could n't tell you how long this will happen , but i am caretaker manager and i believe it will just be for saturday .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your comments : artist 's impression released of hs2 hub
text: the artist 's impression of the hs2 hub at toton ( see 11:56 ) has certainly got you all talking over on the bbc radio nottingham facebook page .
andrew middleton writes : `` waste of money and time , the rail network will need upgrading by the time it 's finished ! ! ! ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: vehicle fire in nottingham
text: firefighters are tackling a vehicle fire in mile end road in colwick .
the blaze is on an industrial estate there .
two crews are in attendance .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

text: the a60 in mansfield woodhouse is closed between the b6407 sookholme road junction and the george street junction because of an incident involving a motorbike and pedestrian .
there is slow traffic and you can follow all the latest here .

# whenlifegivesyoulemons , make lemonade .
a very happy 27th birthday to james taylor .
it must be great to share a birthday with anniversary of cloughie 's arrival at # nffc .
what a day in history !
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: defeat for evans and gb against germany
text: i think it 's fair to say that it has n't been a great day for nottingham-based tennis player dan evans .
the british number three lost 6-4 , 6-3 to alexander zverev in his hopman cup singles rubber .
he then lost the doubles alongside heather watson to mean great britain go out of the round robin event without winning a match .
ouch .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: patients 'may miss out on care and treatment '
text: heather peacock , from west bridgford , suffered a serious brain injury following a car crash in 2015 and has been receiving care and treatment from nottingham 's hospitals ever since .
`` i 'm very worried about future patients who might not get the same amount of great care i received , '' she told bbc radio nottingham .
`` i 've been going back to outpatients for the last year and it has only been in the last few weeks where i have improved . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: change of local live host
text: sandish is now heading off to do something else - so i 'll be stepping in and guiding you through what the rest of friday has to offer .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: journal says more services could change
text: however , the health service journal says it has seen a leaked document to staff that said 13 services will be decommissioned by the ccgs this year .
one of its senior journalists , shaun lintern , said it mentioned an additional 17 services , which are not mentioned in the onilne consultation , but would be `` redesigned '' .

he told bbc radio nottingham : `` the document does n't go into detail about what the changes will be but the 13 services that will be decommissioned , many are to be finished and signed off by july which is an extremely ambitious timetable . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: which services are affected ?
text: the services looking to be affected by the consultations are :
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: services to be moved out of hospitals
text: plans have been announced to move at least seven services out of notingham 's hospitals and into the community .
the local clinical commissioning groups ( ccgs ) say the measures will help to save money and provide better outcomes for patients .
author: Kevin Stanley
Reporter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: british skater will not defend european titles
text: britains best speed skater , who trains in nottingham , is skipping this year 's european championships .
elise christie has had a remarkable start to the skating year , breaking a new world record and winning five gold medals a month .
but the 22-year-old has opted not to travel to the championships this month to give herself maximum training time and help land her first world gold later in the year .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
text: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: watch : friday 's weather outlook
text: another frosty start for many but there will be more cloud around throughout the day with some rain arriving this afternoon and evening .
highs of 5c ( 41f )
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: ebay sale 'to help create interest '
text: mr ward told bbc radio nottingham this morning that he chose to sell the business on ebay because it was a `` popular medium '' and hoped it would be seen by a lot of people as a result .
`` i hoped a lot of people would see it and it would generate interest , which it has done , '' he said .
he said the new owner would carry on the attraction with manager adam greenwood ( to help take it forward .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: owner 'too old ' to carry on attraction
text: the owner , david ward , says the robin hood attraction has been successful but he now needs somebody younger to take it on .
he said he 's more than 70 years old and it needs someone with more energy to `` help it grow '' .
`` it 's not a normal sale , '' he said .
`` we are going to be very choosy about who we sell it to but it needs someone who is going to be passionate about it and to take it forward . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: robin hood attraction for sale on ebay
text: the robin hood legacy attraction in nottingham only opened in july , but it 's been put up for sale this week on ebay .
the venue in friar lane tells the story of the outlaw through the use of audio visual technology , but its owner is now hoping to sell it online for £ 25,000 .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel : accidents causing delays this morning
text: there are a few accidents to be aware of if you 're heading out on the m1 this morning .
one lane is closed on the a52 brian clough way near sandiacre because of an accident involving three vehicles .
there are also long delays on the m1 northbound between j28 ( alfreton ) and j29 ( chesterfield ) because of an earlier accident .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: join us for today 's updates
text: it 's friday !
i 'm in the hot seat writing your updates for today .
today we 're talking about the sale of a robin hood attraction in nottingham , and i 'm sure there will be more forest discussion too .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online
